1111.content: "What's this", Devin asks? He picks up a strange looking device lying right in the path they're walking on. It doesn't look like anything he's ever seen before. It looks made of black metal, but is light as plastic. There are several dim lights that are smooth and almost seem to be shining through the metal. Katherine becomes interested and says, "Let me take a look." She reaches for it and her fingers brush over the lit areas in a random combination. The device begins to hum and the lights grow bright. "Somethings happening", Devin manages to get out right before a jolt of power hits him. Both he and Katherine are thrown back from the power surging from the device and knocked out. Devin is the first to come to, but immediately notices things are not right. He feels light. He then sees his body lying on the ground. "Oh my gawd, I'm dead", he thinks to himself. It explains why he feels so light, he's a spirit. He then notices he still has legs and hands, but they're not his hands. It's then he realizes he's again wearing his jacket. "I gave this to Katherine to wear", he thinks. As he moves his hands over the jacket his flesh doesn't feel right under the jacket. Curious, he opens up the jacket to find something impossible, breasts. There sticking out from his chest are breasts, big breasts, Katherine's breasts. 113112.content:
“Devin are you okay?” asks her old body.

“Wh- What?!” Katherine shrieks in surprise.

Her voice, however, comes out all wrong.

It's a dark, deep, husky baritone.

It's the voice of her boyfriend Devin.

She had the voice of her boyfriend Devin – and was now looking up at her own face, inhabited by … by whom?

“Devin, what's wrong?” asks her old body, more urgently this time. “You passed out on me there. Are you okay? Do you want me to call an ambulance or something?”

In silent, panicked shock Katherine looks down and reexamines her body. Utterly gone are her breasts! She's now the possessor of a flat, muscular chest … strong, hairy arms … and what feels like a thick, heavy sausage jammed in between her legs.

“I'm Devin,” Katherine whispers to herself.

“Devin? What are you saying? What's wrong? Okay, that does it. I'm calling for emergency help,” her old body says urgently.

“No. No, no, no don't do that,” Katherine says with a sigh.

She's not sure how or why this happened, but she's skeptical that a trip to be examined by medical professionals would produce anything but unnecessary stress and perhaps an additional trip to the loony bin.

Something happened to Katherine and Devin to cause them to switch places. Only whatever-it-was hadn't been entirely effective on Katherine herself. She retained her memories of being a woman. But it appeared poor Devin had not just acquired Katherine's body but also her personality and memories.

“I'll be fine,” Katherine gingerly told her old body. “I'll be fine, uh … Katherine. Thanks, but I'll be fine.”

Poor, poor Devin, she thought. He's trapped in there, believing he's really me. With him hypnotized like this, it'll be up to me to figure out how this happened to us … and hopefully find the means to reverse this horrible curse.
